body: We are trying to get rid of the (deprecated) TensorFlowEstimator. Can you rewrite this as an Estimator instead? It's a fairly straightforward translation -- include the optimize_loss call in your model_fn, which has to return also a train_op (which the optimize_loss call creates for you).

It's a fairly straightforward translation -- include the optimize_loss call in your model_fn, which has to return also a train_op (which the optimize_loss call creates for you).
body_text: We are trying to get rid of the (deprecated) TensorFlowEstimator. Can you rewrite this as an Estimator instead? It's a fairly straightforward translation -- include the optimize_loss call in your model_fn, which has to return also a train_op (which the optimize_loss call creates for you).
